content.question: Which of the following most directly contributed to the migration of African Americans in the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries?

choices.label: Publications in African American newspapers that denounced racial oppression
The constant threat of racial violence throughout the Jim Crow South
The end of segregation on railroad passenger cars and interstate bus lines
Job shortages that resulted from confiscation of plantations in the South

content.answer: The constant threat of racial violence throughout the Jim Crow South

topic.text: 3.6: White Supremacist Violence and the Red Summer
